content.detailedDescription: Vista calif-march 8th 2018....Sitting outside my house, just before sunset,facing south,a red object at about 5,00ft zoomed in from the south and came to a abrupt stop and hovered, i took out my cellphone camera and snapped 3 photos,the object made no sound and hovered for about 10 seconds and shot up at an angle heading north, the object was emitting its own light not sunset reflection,i am retired military....This object is unidentified.
content.summary: Unkown object travels in from the south and stops,then goes north

content.detailedDescription:
Les chiens jappaient en pleine nuit alors j ai regardé depuis dehors depuis ma cuisine et il y avait cette lumiere, c etait proche et grand comme une maison, je suis allee prendre mon telephone, j ai pris des photos fenetres ouvertes, il y a rien qui me cache la vue, aucun arbres, rien, pas de galerie au dessus, la lune etait bien visible et les lumieres juste a cote, j ai pense voir un ovni mais pour moi c etait comme un ange, c etait tres beau. je suis monte reveiller mon conjoint, j ai eu du mal a le reveiller, j ai ouvert la fenetre de la chambre, mais les lumieres avaient disparus a la place il y avait une sorte de brume.
propos recueillis par fi j.Charrueau
content.summary: Des lumieres irreelles dans la nuit

content.detailedDescription: In a commercial flight from dubai to karachi (pakistan) during the approach in a clear night at about 15.000 feet i saw a bright light about the same size and colour of planet venus shoot up from the ocean in a parabolic trajectory, changing direction very abruptly and coming back down into the water. it went up about 50.000 feet in the horizon in front of us and came back into the water. the whole event lasted about 1 second only, which to me made it quite clear that it was something unidentified that defy, the laws of physics with such a huge speed and directional change in such a short period of time. i have no explanation for that other than something from out of this planet.
content.summary: Ufo sighting from airplane flight deck .

content.detailedDescription: In a commercial flight from dubai to karachi (pakistan) during the approach in a clear night at about 15.000 feet i saw a bright light about the same size and colour of planet venus shoot up from the ocean in a parabolic trajectory, changing direction very abruptly and coming back down into the water. it went up about 50.000 feet in the horizon in front of us and came back into the water. the whole event lasted about 1 second only, which to me made it quite clear that it was something unidentified that defy, the laws of physics with such a huge speed and directional change in such a short period of time. i have no explanation for that other than something from out of this planet.
content.summary: Ufo sighting from airplane flight deck .

content.detailedDescription:
Since witnessing an orange ufo in miami come from the south east of 67th and miller drive in miami orange orb that did not change shape, contacted and "involved" in fifth kind (ongoing contact 24/7) of "alien abduction" dream manipulation and mind control, yielding to an ongoing operation involving many millions of other people in the continental united states.
this particular orange followed me since 2009/2010-now, just beyond visible spectrum, ongoing contact with semi-visible grey beings, non-telepathic and telepathic obe contact. i saw attached man in my head. they never leave
content.summary: Since 2010 orange ufo followed me in program to oakland, 5th kind

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on highway 339 near yerington nevada, where the 339 and 208 meet. i was making a road trip to visit my boyfriend in southern california and did not want to drive during the day because i just wanted to get there already because i knew the drive would be long. i left around 10:30pm and got to the spot i spotted these lights at around 11:20. funny thing is i had downloaded some podcasts to listen to on my long drive and i love listening to conspiracy ones so i was actually listening to a podcast at the time of this event, the title of the podcast was "where are all the aliens?" so i was driving on the road listening to the podcast and out of nowhere i see a light come through the trees as if a helicopter spotlight was searching for someone. i immediately turn off the podcast and look around as i am driving. i look up in the sky and start slowing down but see nothing, no plane, no helicopter, nothing. i did not even hear one noise. so i keep driving and see to the left a barn with a porch like lamp on the side of it and that was not enough light to make that big cast of light so i cancel that out. i keep driving about 30 more seconds and i see the light again, i am telling you this light was so huge and big it could not have been a flashlight, barn lamp, or car lights because it was 11:20 pm and all that was to the left of me was mostly farm land. i keep thinking it is still a helicopter spotlight so i keep looking around but can not see a thing in the sky. so at this point i am a little freaked out, i decide to try and call my boyfriend and the phone call would not go through, it would just say called failed without even ringing. i once again keep driving and saw the light once more, this light was not as bright as the first two times but still looked like a spotlight. by the way on the side where i kept seeing lights was mostly trees and farmland. i did not see anymore lights after that but did have a eerie feeling the rest of my night driving. i felt like i was being watched all throughout my drive through sweet water road. that road is very lonely and has lots of trees and rocks on each side and it was just not a good feeling driving through that at night.
content.summary: Driving on highway 339 and saw flashing lights, came down like spotlights, no helicopter or planes around or any sounds. phone could not make any calls afterwards.

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were on our way back from altoona and it was almost nine o clock at night. we came down a steep hill that was outside of cassandra and i was watching the road when my mom suddenly said, “what’s that?” i turned to my right to look out the window and there was this bright conjoined light in the sky. within seconds of seeing it, the lights dimmed and got smaller as they aligned into a straight line, then changing colors and expanding into the shape of a triangle. we watched it before driving through a tunnel and then lost sight of it on the way out of the tunnel. i’ve lived there for 18 years and we have never seen a ufo anywhere near there or near our town. i never believed in ufos i usually thought it was cgi, a blimp, chinese lanterns, etc. but that sighting changed my mind. we were blown away by what we witnessed
content.summary: Bizarre

content.detailedDescription:
1.Einsiedel-schweiz ,walk surroundings
2.In a few days in the photo
3.100% ufo
4.Foto
5.None
6.Foto
content.summary: Foto

content.detailedDescription:
after i uploaded my pictures, i noticed that one of them had round objects in it, i did not see anything while i was taking the picture...I had enlarged the picture trying to figure out what these could be, this happened between 1:15-1:30:pm. march 8th 2018.
i did notice that these objects in the picture seem to be above the power lines that were down due to a snow storm that we had the day before...
content.summary: Round, grey

content.detailedDescription:
We lived in mispec, new brunswick on the bay of fundy. we had numerous sightings in the late 1950s. we were in a very rural area where most people did not have electricity near us. we had a perfect view of the bay with no fog or clouds most of the night hours that season.
on our first sighting we had just come home from saint john from visiting our familty. it was dark and no moon the first sighting. 
i have mapped out using google maps where we lived and where we saw our first sighting.
it was my father, mother, brother and sister who witnessed this sighting and none of us knew what it was.
being from that culture we had heard numerous ghost stories of the maritime area and we grew up with that mindset.
the object had 3 to 5 lights on it with changeing colours and blinking on and off. we knew it was not a plane, jet or helicopter and because of it being at least 100 feet over the ocean it could not be a ship.
the oject moved only slightly for at least one hour, to the point we were getting bored. it did leave and traveled s.E. over the water and went into the bay.
we had numerous sightings after that as well as the fishermen telling stories of what they saw numerous times while lobster and cod fishing as far out and 5 to 10 miles.
im 66 years old now and all of the people and family members are gone. but that being said not one person ever took photos of any of their sightings.
i just heard about a documentory that showed how the canadian government ask the american navy to help study these sightings in the 50 and 60s.
i would be interested in learning more about what we saw.
i live in las vegas now and in the 1970s we wittnessed ufo's in the skies are vegas but nothing ive seen in nevada was as close as these sightings.
it is my theory that the reason for so much ufo sightings is our tides at the bay of fundy are the most extreme in the world. we have as much as 50 feet difference from low tide to high tide. as well at most of the bay of fundy is not over 300 feet deep which is perfect for marine life to reproduce.
i am a disabled viet nam veteran and am getting ready to retire. i would like to learn more about what you do.
content.summary: Bright lights blinking, colourful, would hover for long periods of time, numerous occastions

content.detailedDescription: Was outside with other co-workers, shoveling snow around parking lot.  sky was crystal clear, hi visibility, zero cloud cover and no ground lighting due to power outage in the area. (from winter storm the day before)  saw the sky light up in my peripheral vision, heard a low-frequency boom, sounded very far away.  looked up and saw an object moving very fast in one direction, leaving a light-trail behind it, covered a large area of sky very fast, then without changing speed changed direction about 170 degrees.  it then appeared to slow a bit, make a few more abrupt changes in direction then exited sight very quickly, again a low-frequency boom was heard after.  this all happened in what i would guess to be no more than 3-4 seconds.
content.summary: Zig-zagging at high speeds, impossible for known aircraft, light-trail

content.detailedDescription: Felt like i was in a movie. left my mum's house to travel home which take about 6 mins. i left at 1.30 am i got home at 2.20am. i didn't drink i wouldn't drink.And drive. i turned right onto croxteth hall lane a long county lane. leads over a small bridge. just before i got there i noticed from my right eye line a shudder like you see something then you look again to make sure. as i did 3 orange and 2 white lights shot past me from right to left. no other cars where in front of behind me. i pulled over, curious at the park entrance. i looked to me left and above the tree line was a small cylinder shoes objected. i watched it for what seemed about 5 min. i looked in my car for my phone that's when i noticed it was 2.20am on the clock. which had me puzzled i looked up to see of the object was still there it was. i opened up my phone to open the camera. as i did the object seemed to love left i stopped what i was doing then it shot off straight up and left again. it wasn't a helicopter or plane there was no sound apart from when it took off with a humming sound. no wind in the area either as it rained not long before. the road was dry
content.summary: Light from right to left.V fast pulled over. object over tree line. everything silent time stood still. humming then silent again

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1.  my friends and i were on our college campus walking to get food across campus
2.  my one friend pointed to it in the sky and got our attention 
3.  at first, we thought it was a drone but the more we thought about it after the fact, we realized it maybe was something else
4.  the object was a triangle, it had a white light on each of the ends.  i also noticed some grey lines on the triangle.  the object was moving fast, and then all of a sudden it disappeared
5.  during the sighting, we were mesmerized by it.  i was trying to get a good look at it, i was about to take out my phone but then it disappeared.  
6.  the object disappeared out of thin air, we were watching it and then it just disappeared
content.summary: Ufo was spotted for about 15  secs then it disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking with the naked eye since the night was very, very clear.  i was looking at the big dipper, and with what i first noticed that there were 2 many stars in the big dipper.  these 2 stars became very bright, and large (like venus) however, much brighter.  in fact, venus isn't in the area of the big dipper.

these 2 very bright objects were higher than the 2 jets headed se that i saw flying way under these objects.  the jets would be about 30,000 - 35,000 ft and these 2 objects were much, much larger and much higher.

these 2 were flying very fast in circles and come to a dead stop after coming out of the big dipper.  on became smaller, while the other became much more larger.  my vantage point allows clear visuals since i don't have city lights affecting my view.

then after watching these 2 lights, i tried taking a picture with my cell phone however, nothing could be seen.  these lights start doing verticle aerobatics then started with the circles.

both headed in separate directions slow, and then like a blink both were gone.  the larger one headed into the direction of the nw, while the other headed e.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Sighting in large dipper n - ne

content.detailedDescription:
One summer evening in 1968, 17 years of age at the time, i was with my immediate family in the park facility which faced rear of my project building. it was just about 7:00 to 7:30pm and i was seated on a swing facing south. to my left (east ) was my building some 20 stories high, to my right was the park and the public school, to the front, looking south  was my family chatting on the benches, my mother and father, my uncle and wife, and 2 cousins . . .  i could also see the distant empire state building ( this was at 137th street in the bronx ). i am and was an avid aircraft enthusiast planing to become a pilot in the usaf. as i was swaying in the swing a bright light, commensurate with a star like venus size at arm’s length caught my attention as it appeared from the sixth level story of my project to my left or the 10:00 o’clock position. this was the route that aircraft coming from la guardia airport frequently took. this time the familiar aircraft lighting was not present, instead , it was a brightly lit starlike sphere. i followed it as it moved from east to west in a rising elliptical motion or parallel to the earth circumference at approximately twice the speed of a jetliner on take off pattern some 300 knots. . . then . . . as i was trying to distinguish some detail of the object it began to fade out at around 11:00 to 11:30 o’clock position. at the same time it began to slow down until it came into a halt !. i was mesmerized. . .That was no helicopter, much less any aircraft that i knew of then. . .I immediately began to shout to my parents to come and see what i was seeing . . .Initially they just went on chatting , but i got the attention of my uncle who began to walk my way. . .I just could not / would not take my eyes off the object that now looked like a black hole against the city night lit sky. when my uncle was some half way to me, i immediately saw to my amazement how the spheric object lit up again and sped off in a southward direction perpendicular to its original path at a tremendous if not incredible speed until it was out of vision right after it went past the empire state building. i later in retrospect calculated the object at some 100 ft in diameter and around 15 to 20,000 ft in altitude. it then sped off instantly at around 2,000 knots. 
in 2007 i was doing some search on the internet and an article appeared about some animal mutilations that went on the flushing meadows area of queens. when i read the article i immediately associated the incident with my ce-3 experience. numerous animals were bloodlessly dissected in the flushing meadows zoo and it coincided with the date of my experience. 
to this day i often think about that sighting and ever since i believe in extraterrestrial life.
content.summary: Ufo emerging from la guardia airport

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were stargazing by our window on august 27, 2017 at 9pm. throughout the next 15 minutes we noticed 2 flashing vehicles that kept hovering/flying within out view in the distance. they would hover in a still position for a while then change directions. at first they looked like airplanes or helicopters but they were silent and kept hovering and changing directions quickly. at 915pm i started recording them until they finally vanished. in the second video, on november 22nd of 2017, i saw a silent solo flying object that stayed in a still hovering position for a few minutes before finally changing directions as i zoomed out of focus.
content.summary: 2 ufos hovering around changing directions while flying

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my deck cleaning. when i noticed a orange light, which looks like a street light, floating on the back of my property where a governmentfiber optic cable line runs. it was a continual light, and as it moved there was slight zigzag. when i pulled my phone out to try to take a picture... it stopped and then vanished. i’m still trying to process this experience.
content.summary: I noticed a orange light slowly moving across the sky. it changed course & dissappeared when i tried to photograph it

content.detailedDescription:
It was almost 5 am when i heard a loud, plane-like noise coming from outside. it was too loud and to long to have come from any car, truck or bike from the street. it seemed airborne and had about the same duration as a plane would have. 
right away, i checked the flight radar and found that the most recent flight had arrived at 4:27am (aprox), which was around 20 minutes earlier. it would be unlikely to have come from any comercial flight. i am positive the sound was real, as i discussed it with my also present friend.
content.summary: Loud jetlike noise heard at night

content.detailedDescription: At time of sighting, was dwelling on brixton dr. in extreme ne quadrant of amarillo, tx.  was outdoors in rear yard of residence in early afternoon, prior to my kids' arrival back home from school by bus, engaged in activity of jumping on trampoline while facing north.  day was seasonably warm in temp., do not recall noticeable wind, sun was approx. 45 degrees off of horizon to ssw, and regional sky cloudless, with exception of single, smallish, white, "oddball" cloud noted to extreme north.  personal past experiences had made me a bit more interested/aware than most of things in the air around me, and while maintaining caution towards landings during jumping on trampoline, would periodically glance idly about the sky around me, to see if any aircraft could be seen, especially with the nearby proximity of amarillo international airport few miles away from my position, to the ese.  glancing quickly around me while jumping, i noticed something traveling in the air approx. 1.5-2 miles to the east of my position, that i took at first, quick glance as a common commercial passenger airliner.  with quick glance at object, had noted there was something "unusual/not right" about its appearance, causing me to do "double-take" glance back at object, whereupon noticed that object did not appear to possess wings, or tail structures.  realization caused me to stop trampoline jumping activity, and brought object under intense observation.  object was initially at approx. 15 degrees off of the horizon (approx. 30 degrees, when nearest), at estimated altitude of approx. 3,000 ft., on a nw trajectory course, traveling at speed normally associated to commercial airliner travel speed while slowly gaining altitude.  no associated noise or smell detected throughout incident, no detected reactions from area's scattered cattle present, and object seemed to always display linear trajectories & consistent speed.  initially, watched object travel from the point to my east, to a point to my nw, with the object  approaching to within approx. 3/4-1 mile distance, when passed point to my ne, with total uninterrupted initial observation time of approx. 3-3.5 minutes.  object appeared as large, round-ended, material construct of cylindrical shape, composed of metallic exterior with appearance/coloration of dull, aged/weathered, non-reflective aluminum/magnesium, with estimated length approx. 80-100 ft., and diameter of approx. 20-25 ft.  object appeared to be moderately covered upon its exterior surface with seemingly random arrangement of mostly square & rectangular "panels/patchworks", of dull, flat, darkish, brick-red/red-brown coloration (maroon?).  while had object under such observation, , specifically looked for conventional features found on normal aircraft, but detected no wings, no tail structure, no engines, no contrail/exhaust trail/turbine thermal heat-ripple trail, no landing gear, no windows/portals, no doors/hatches, no copula, no gondola, no exterior lights, and no exterior lettering/numbers/logos.  while observing object, experienced growing sense of unease & confusion as systematically failed to detect any conventional features upon it, as well as a growing "sense" that the occupants/controllers of object were "aware" that had them under observation, and were somehow "reading my thoughts" throughout the incident.  when object reached a point to my nw, and appeared intent on continuing onward away from my location, i derisively dismissed the whole thing as "b.S.", figured inability to detect conventional features upon object "must" simply be due to my particular angle of observation, as such are only the type of things read about in newspapers/magazines, or sees on t.V.  disregarded object and took eyes off it for approx. 10 seconds, while i resumed vigorous jumping activity upon trampoline, again.  after approx. 10 seconds of jumping, complete inability to detect anything conventional about object gradually weighed heavy enough on mind, that cast suspicious glance back into area of sky had last seen object, and was fairly shocked & astonished to see object had apparently "reversed course", and was now headed in opposite direction, towards where had been first spotted, without having swung around wide in normal aircraft "turn", as object appeared to keep the same side oriented towards me, throughout incident.  realizing such maneuver would be impossible for something conventional size of commercial airliner, immediately stopped trampoline jumping activity again, cursed self for missing course reversal being executed, and again brought object under intense observation for similar period of approx. 3-3.5 minutes.  observation results were just as confusing as before, although again sensed object's occupants/controllers had intensified their own awareness of me, perhaps being unfamiliar with function of trampoline, and may have "surprised" them enough with such, to reverse course and pass by again, for "2nd look".  when object reached approx. location where first seen, again derisively dismissed whole thing as b.S., although not as "confidently" as before, and repeated process of taking eyes off the object for approx. 10 seconds, while again resumed trampoline activities.  unconventional nature of object was weighing even heavier on mind, and after jumping again for brief period, glanced with trepidation back towards where object last seen.  was bit stunned & dumbfounded to observe had again missed witnessing a course reversal executed by object, stopped jumping activity again, brought object under intense observation once more, with mental determination not take eyes off again, in case executed another course reversal, until could no longer see/detect it.  with this last course reversal, object appeared to have adjusted its course trajectory somewhat, and now traveling in direction more to north, appearing to slowly, gradually increase altitude as progressed.  had sense that object's occupants/controllers were aware of my thought determinations towards witnessing course reversal & continuing observation uninterrupted until lost to sight, as object never thereafter executed another course reversal under observation, and object now seemed to head towards the one small, oddball cloud formation in region, in extreme north.  had object under observation another approx. 7-8 minutes, until lost in distance to unaided eye, prior having reached distant cloud.  cloud estimated at approx. 10,000-15,000 ft. altitude.  when first sighted, object passing over/near then-recent "ground-breaking" efforts towards multiple, new texas department of criminal justice sites/buildings.  in area proximity is also pantex plant, where u.S. was dismantling "surplus" nuclear weapons during time period, from treaty with u.S.S.R.  several weapons storage bunkers evident around plant area, and object may originally in area to "survey" new construction sites.  almost immediately thereafter incident, developed sense of dread/foreboding had attracted unwanted "attention" by phenomenon, and quite soon thereafter began noticing signs/evidence of possible abduction activity involving my kids, as well as their nearby cousins/friends.  sketches available.
content.summary: Daytime large cylinder

content.detailedDescription: Lost in the mountains at night i decided to video the stars.  the object wasn’t noticed until reviewing the videos.   the videos were taken in the mountains around sedona, arizona. i have another video with two objects that will not upload.
content.summary: Actually didn’t notice anything until review of the video

content.detailedDescription: I was on the phone with a friend whom i served with in the us military. we were talking about our lives; and moving forward when i went outside for a smoke. we continued talking for a few, until the while sky lighted up blue. and it was over cast and snowing! i said " dude wow! what just happened!" my friend told me it was nothing and " it was prob just an f-18" then it happened again! as the second flash happens i rand into my backyard through the snow. a huge blue flash of the whole night sky followed by a cut out of our cell call. after 45 seconds he called back and asked what was going on. he had heard what i had seen as i was on the phone but a lot more "%^&^". finally as i am walking from the middle of my yard into my home there is a blue ball that travels from the marsh over the tree tops and over my house with out a sound onto the field across the street and out of sight; i was on the phone the whole time until it cut out again. after a few minutes i make it inside, call my buddy back, and explain, and another blue flash happens, then our cell drops again.
content.summary: Two blue flashes of light, 2 mins apart, in a snow storm. then a blue/red fly over. on phone whole time.

content.detailedDescription:
The beginning

i had a habit of looking down at my feet while walking as a child; it was a game i used to play when i was around eight or nine years old. one early evening, i am working my way down the road, heading home after leaving a friends place. i had my head down, looking at my feet as i walked, while keeping the curb insight out of the corner of my eye. the challenge to this game however, was to try and guess how far i had walked, and how close i was getting to my house without cheating by looking up. when i finally stopped and lifted my head, i realized with a smile of triumph that i was standing right in front of my house. we lived in a one story, back split house with an open carport, were the front of the house faced east, and the back faced west. the house was also perched on a rise that over looked the rest of the neighborhood to the west. 

i remember feeling the low suns warmth on the right side of my face as i stood there in the street as it began to set. its warmth drew me, i remember closing my eyes as i turned and faced west into the suns direction so i could bask in its comforting orange glow for the moment. turning my head and looking east, i noticed the night’s zenith approaching; i loved this time of the evening, i loved the way you could track the night’s zenith moving across the sky back then. i remember wondering at that moment, if i looked strait up, maybe i would be able to see the first star of the night; i use to like wishing on the first star at that age.

as i saluted the sky to block the sunlight while stretching my head back to look strait up, i noticed the first bright star in the sky directly above me. i remember thinking how lucky i was, as i took a moment to search the rest of the sky above me for more stars, but found none. now i am sure, i had only taken my eyes off the star above me for only a brief moment when i scanned the rest of the sky. nevertheless, before i could finish assembling my thoughts that were beginning to materialize in my mind about what wish i was going to make, a bright object about the size of a quarter held at arms length was there above me instead.


before i had time to express my amazement, a huge oval object over twice the size of a house, materialized directly above me, it was floating silently just above the height of the tv aerials, which most of the homes had, back then. it had gone from the size of a quarter to the size of the monster that hovered over me now, in the blink of an eye, without making a sound. 

i could not stop my legs from shaking as i stood there paralyzed with fear, i was scared shitless and amazed at the same time, and i could not move as i studied the mirror like surface of the object that had stopped to look me over. it was the first and the last time that i ever remembered experiencing, involuntary body movement. i also remember hearing in my peripheral, the lawn mower that had been going across the street, stop. it was then; that i realized i was not as alone as i felt.

my eyes were glued to the object, and it felt as if time stood still. i could see the whole neighborhood reflected off the curvature of the crafts mirrored surface. the roof of my house was inverted in the objects reflective surface, with the reflected tv aerial, looking like it was close to touching the real thing. what made the whole experience even more surreal was the memory of seeing the sun setting, and the sun setting off the westward rim of the object; it was as if i was watching two sunsets, which is an image that has been burned into my mind, to this day.  

it was a huge egg shaped mirror. those were my last thoughts as i watched it slowly begin to float away from me, silently moving north up the street, while finally gaining altitude as it flew over my school before disappearing from sight.

as soon as i was able to move, i went running screaming my head off into my house, freaking my mother out, she thought at the time i had hurt myself. at first, she refused to believe the incident as i told her. we had a running joke going on in the family back then, where she would tell my brother and me that she was from outer space. my mother thought at first that i might have been influenced by her stories, until she heard the incident reported on the radio. i do not think she was ever able to bring herself to believe the personal nature of the experience that had happened to me, as i had described it to her back then. what adult truly listens to a kid with the same level of belief that they would have with another adult. 

over one hundred people saw this object, including my teacher mrs. davis from the school i attended, and it also made the news on the radio as well. it happened in scarborough, ont., canada, about a mile south of the ctv television station. i was eight or nine at the time so this incident took place in 1963 or 1964, i cannot remember which.
content.summary: See full discription

content.detailedDescription: I was in backyard cleaning yard and then i saw three to four black helicopters over kirtland airforce base and i saw them cross over the ufo's, i was bracing for a collision. no collision occured, a large black object that didn't look solid, didn't flash or emit any light appeared and i looked to the north and saw 17 smaller black objects, two of which manuevered in a sort of playful way with another black object and then all the objects including the mother ship proceeed to the north along the front of the sandia mountains.  i was breathless, shocked and in disbelief.  there was a fleet of 17 black ufo's flying in a northerly direction.  i then lost sight of the objects.
content.summary: I yelled to them f**k you grays and through the finger up to them.

content.detailedDescription: It was 1987 in the month of november. i was 15 years old having a cigarette in the backyard when i observed this. it was overcast and the objects were flying below the clouds. they were boomerang shaped with no lights. flying too slow for conventional flight. there were 3 flying in a v formation. at first i thought nothing of it because living near to trenton on the location of canada's largest air base i'm used to seeing aircraft flying over. but it suddenly occurred to me...There was no sound. no lights. i haven't told anyone about this experience. until now.
content.summary: 3 objects below cloud cover going over me

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving on cecil ave nw toward n broadway
2. topped a hill 
3. i knew what it was and i gave it the finger
4. it was like 2 disc on top and bottom with windows in the middle all the way around it.
5. i was talking to my husband while i was driving, i got mad, i felt like i wanted to fight it, and gave it the finger and called it a name, but husband says he did not see it was wondering if i was loosing my mind.
6. i lost sight of it when i looked back down at the road to not hit anyone and try to pull over so could get better look when i looked back up it was cloked or hid behind the cloud it was in cause i was not able to see it anymore.
content.summary: Was driving nw on cecil ave to go home topped the hill and there was a huge ufo in the clouds partially in and partially out there were no lights on it was like 2 disc on top and bottom with windows all around the ufo in the middle of the 2 disc,

content.detailedDescription: Saturday  march 3,2018, myself and a friend were heading back to louisville  from the red mile gaming facility at about  5:30 . we were heading west on hywy 64w. the sun was starting to set, being a sky watcher i noticed this elongated  looking object that appeared to be hovering (not moving), and then we saw several fast moving objects moving  from south to north at almost horizon level. i was able to snap a few photos, but due to flowing traffic i was unable get better shots. i circled the objects in question.
content.summary: Travelling  on hywy 64w noticed a bright  elongated object going  straight up with several other objects going from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared slightly east of rt 183 1 mile north of gonzales tx, traveling due west at a very high rate. when i crested the hill and was able to see the object again, i saw 2 of them, apperared to be in a formation were one was lower and to the right. they were completely out of sight in seconds. talked to ken atg the san antonio office, he told me to file this report. i first thought it was an ultra light plane by our little airport, but quickly realised it was big, the i thought...Man is that thing booking accross the sky. then i saw the other one. no time to react...Soooooo fast!
content.summary: Large, very low to the ground and very fast. est 1800 mph

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting with my mothers caregiver in the livingroom. it was about 12:30am i looked up at the skylight to see the stars now and again. at one point i looked up and saw a white orb-like object slowly moving north. it looked like the size of a basketball. i said "look at that weird light, what is that?" the caregiver was sitting on the other side of the room and did not have the view i did. i stood up, it was still moving slowly north. i took one more look to study it for details. it was featureless, except for the white glow. as i studied it, it suddenly moved out of sight. the caregiver was slow to get up from the other side of the room and did not see the object. we went outside to see if we could see anything, it was a clear stary night. we could not see anything that could explain what i saw.
content.summary: I was sitting with my mothers caregiver in the livingroom. it was about 12:30am i looked up at the skylight to see the stars now and again. i looked up and saw a white orb-like object slowly moving north. it looked like the size of a basketball.

content.detailedDescription:
We were coming home from renton wa and at aproximatly 950 955sh on top of the aberdeen bluff i witnessed a bright glowing red light with a orange yellow outside in the sky over south aberdeen and to my suprise it rapidly decended over the back hills of south aberdeen towards westport area into the tree line i think what ever it was crashed.I think it my have been a meteor but it didn't light the sky up like one and i've witnessed meteors before never this color and it was glowing bright red, anyways it really startled me as odd and i lay wake all night thinking about what it may be.

p.S. im also attaching a photo of a ufo i caught of my porch in october i'll file a report on it later.
content.summary: I was on the bluff and this bright red yellow orange ball crashed into the hills

content.detailedDescription: in mid to late 2012 i started to find weird pictures and videos on my cell. i have way too many ufo sightings and alien interaction to even try and explain in this little area. the visitations continue and my evidence grows.
content.summary: read the answer to next question
